replies.body:
LOVE YOUR ARTWORKS AND DETAIL! HOPE YOU'RE ENTERING THE STAR GUARDIAN COMP LIKE ME :D but anyways, I think your style is very nice, so, great job sir!  
{{champion:121}}  ~Mizuri
love the kalista <3 , very big fan of {{champion:429}}  and i dont often see her fan art a lot ,you did it so well keep it up <3

Absolutely stunning art mate, I would love to have more of these as a rotating wallpaper selection for my computer. Would you mind if I download these (and any others that I can source), for my own personal wallpaper selections please?

this is so cool, they are really good too. 

keep it up
